Uses of Interface
messages.MessageQ

Packages that use MessageQ
function A good place for classes that represent the possibles function related to the NodeFunction nodes in the factor graph. 
messages Provides classes for accessing, reading, sending and managing messages. 
operation Provides classis for operate and executing max sum algorithm.
